title: General Mathematics Course
description: In collaboration with the National Institute of Technology Hamirpur. Covers basic arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and statistics, and prepares you for exams like CSAT, Army, Police, and Railways.

title: Advanced AI Course
description: Learn AI in collaboration with NIT Hamirpur. Explore Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI model deployment using Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Solve real-world problems, especially in agriculture.
details: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI applications
AI model deployment for real-world problems
